name: leaflet-streetlabels
description: Display the street labels following polylines for Leaflet

scripts.build: npm install && npm audit fix --force && uglifyjs src/Leaflet.streetlabels.js -o dist/Leaflet.streetlabels.js && uglifyjs src/Leaflet.streetlabels.js -m -c -o docs/Leaflet.streetlabels.js

author: Jorge Santos
